question: Dr. Ali Question 1 In the membrane of the pre-synaptic neuron, the neurotransmitter is released in response to which of the following events?
options: Opening of K+ channel voltage gated
Opening of Na+ channel voltage gated
Opening of Clâˆ’ channel voltage gated
Opening of Ca++ channel voltage gated
answerText: Opening of Ca++ channel voltage gated

question: Dr. Ali Question 2 The release of inhibitory neurotransmitter leads to which of the changes in the postsynaptic membrane?
options: Opening of K+ channels at the surface of the postsynaptic membrane
answerText: Opening of K+ channels at the surface of the postsynaptic membrane
